sircovid 0.2.32

Create parameters

generate_parameters.Rd

Create parameters for use with the model

generate_parameters(
  sircovid_model = basic_model(),
  transmission_model = "POLYMOD",
  country = "United Kingdom",
  severity_data_file = NULL,
  infection_seeding = list(values = c(10), bins = c("15 to 19")),
  beta = 0.1,
  beta_times = "2020-02-02",
  trans_profile = c(1),
  trans_increase = c(1),
  hosp_transmission = 0.1,
  ICU_transmission = 0.05,
  dt = 0.25,
  use_polymod_pop = FALSE
)

Arguments

sircovid_model

Model to use, basic_model() or hospital_model()
transmission_model

Model type. Only 'POLYMOD' currently supported
country

Country name
severity_data_file

Location of file with severity data
infection_seeding

List of vector values of how many cases to seed in a correspond vector of age bins in bins.
beta

Beta, for each time step in beta_times
beta_times

Dates beta changes, in format yyyy-mm-dd
trans_profile

Proportion in each infectivity group
trans_increase

Relative infectivity of each group
hosp_transmission

Transmission rate of hospital cases
ICU_transmission

Tranmissions rate of ICU cases
dt

Time-step to run the model in days
use_polymod_pop

Set to ignore survey_pop_in and use the population from polymod when estimating the transmission matrix

Value

List of parameters for use with sircovid

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
